MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA2 postcode area of Kilmarnock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm to repair a fault on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:08pm on the 27th of March 2021.
